links.title: Text Extraction Examples | adbar/trafilatura | DeepWiki
links.description: Theextract() function intrafilatura/core.py 100-184 serves as the primary entry point, accepting multiple parameters to control extraction behavior. The function returns plain text by default but supports multiple output formats through the output_format parameter.
